item.title: Setup Headless Raspberry Pi
item.description: Setup a headless Raspberry Pi Requirements Raspberry Pi with power supply SD Card Imaging the SD Card: Download Raspbian lite (this has no DE, if you want a DE download the full iso image not lite) Raspbian Downloads Use an application like EthcherBalena to write to the SD Card. Steps to take once the image is written to the SD Card: Once the image is written to the SD Card open a terminal and browse to the the SD Card (Usually /Volumes/boot/).
